row.process:
:SET &OS_VER#=get_var('UC_HOST_SW_VERS') :P "OS Version: &OS_VER#" :PRINT "&UC4RB_SVC_SERVICE_NAME#" %WINDIR%\system32\sc.exe query "&UC4RB_SVC_SERVICE_NAME#" > temp\serviceStatus.txt @set retcode=%errorlevel% @if NOT %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 goto :retcode @type temp\serviceStatus.txt | findstr /c:"The specified service does not exist as an installed service" @set retcode=%errorlevel% @if %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 exit 1
%WINDIR%\system32\sc.exe qc "&UC4RB_SVC_SERVICE_NAME#" > temp\serviceConfig.txt %WINDIR%\system32\sc.exe qdescription "&UC4RB_SVC_SERVICE_NAME#" > temp\serviceDesc.txt %WINDIR%\system32\sc.exe qfailure "&UC4RB_SVC_SERVICE_NAME#" > temp\serviceFailure.txt %WINDIR%\system32\sc.exe qsidtype "&UC4RB_SVC_SERVICE_NAME#" > temp\serviceSidType.txt
rem 2008 and 2008R2 only IF "&OS_VER#" EQU "6.0" ( %WINDIR%\system32\sc.exe qfailureflag "&UC4RB_SVC_SERVICE_NAME#" > temp\serviceFailureFlag.txt %WINDIR%\system32\sc.exe qprivs "&UC4RB_SVC_SERVICE_NAME#" > temp\servicePrivs.txt )
rem 2008R2 only IF "&OS_VER#" EQU "6.1" ( %WINDIR%\system32\sc.exe qfailureflag "&UC4RB_SVC_SERVICE_NAME#" > temp\serviceFailureFlag.txt %WINDIR%\system32\sc.exe qprivs "&UC4RB_SVC_SERVICE_NAME#" > temp\servicePrivs.txt %WINDIR%\system32\sc.exe qtriggerinfo "&UC4RB_SVC_SERVICE_NAME#" > temp\serviceTriggerInfo.txt )
